page.title: 17 Recreation
page.content: {Children's games at Home} Games played in the home are more sophisticated and needs specialized equipment,Cricket,Football,Roller skating,snooker and Computer games are some of those currently popular. There are many board games using dice, counters and the like are winter attractions.Monopoly and Trivial Pursuit are fairly recent additions but annually,usually around Christmas, a new variety comes on the market. Games requiring imagination and improvisation tend to be decreasing.A vertion of the ageless game "Hide and Seek"is "Acci".This is a game played inside.Players move around the house from one hide to another.If "on"sees someone he or she calls "Acci 123"and the name of the spied and where. Everyone else must then stay in their hide until found.The first seen is"on"
